homepage.hero.description.message: Build better XAML applications with proven patterns, cross-platform support, and a unified API that works across WPF, .NET MAUI, Uno Platform, and Avalonia.

homepage.features.crossPlatform.descript.message: Write once, deploy everywhere. Prism 9 provides a unified API across WPF, .NET MAUI, Uno Platform, and Avalonia. Maximize code reuse and minimize platform-specific code.

homepage.features.mvvm.description.message: Build maintainable, testable applications with Prism's implementation of MVVM patterns. Dependency injection, commands, and navigation work seamlessly together out of the box.

homepage.features.enterprise.description.message: Modular architecture, event aggregation, and loose coupling make Prism perfect for large-scale applications. Keep your code organized and your team productive.
